Articles.Content:
Where do I find those folded panels? I've been looking in the video description, but all of the mods listed there, I can't find ANY solar panel like that.

Please reply quick, I'm DYING to build my own space station!
I believe that was the MultiJointPart plugin example solar panel, which IIRC doesn't work correctly with 0.16. There are plenty of other folding solar panels out there though.
Ah, good. Which mods have folding solar panels, then?

Ah, good. Which mods have folding solar panels, then?

Check out MMI's thread in releases. Dani-Sang's panels are some of my favorite. Also check out the dynasat thread. The panels there are really cool, too. The Kosmos pack has some too, but I'm not sure they are updated to work, and they kick like a mule when you deploy them.

Nova's got some panels in the probodobodyne kit, but they are non functional at the moment..

Edited August 24, 2012 by dishycourier
